well, usually if there is a backward continuation of what that spirit said =
 
on the forward side, it will be right behind their words going forward, s=
o 
it's  easy to find as it's in the same voice.  I've also tested them out=
 
using  same words for my own voice just to see if it could bring the same=
 
results, and  it usually does not. this way I know it's real. sf
 
 
In a=
 message dated 3/6/2011 11:24:01 P.M. Eastern Standard Time,  
adrianamjone=
s@... writes:

 
 
 
Very cool file. I hear you on the having so many=
 files you don't know what  
to do with them... ghost boxing 4 months now, =
and I've come to the 
bittersweet  realization that I've probably only harv=
ested a percentage of the  
communication that's there in my sessions.... I=
 haven't even listened to any  of 
my stuff backwards yet, and of the few t=
hings I've listened backwards, I've 
 had amazing success rate of communica=
tion. GB communication is just so  
abundant!
